sn35.77:1.1: “Yaṁ kho, rādha, dukkhaṁ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.77:1.3: Cakkhu kho, rādha, dukkhaṁ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.77:1.7: yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassa …pe… adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi dukkhaṁ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35.77:1.12: yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi dukkhaṁ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.77:1.13: Yaṁ kho, rādha, dukkhaṁ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
